root.title: Altyn-kol (е-28)
root.place: The monument was found in district named Altyn-Kol at the left coast of the river Abakan.
root.store: Martyanov organized moving the monument to Minusinsk museum in 1881. Minusinsk museum, Inv# 27.
root.general: There were erected two similar monuments against each other (Е 28 and Е 29).
root.description: Е 28 is made of reddish sandstone. The top part of it is curved. There are 9 lines of texts in four sides. There is no sign on the stone.
root.size: Height - 1,38 m, length - 0,35-0,43 m, width - 0,19 m.
root.investigation: Found in 1878. Investigated by W.Radloff, H.N.Orhun, S.E.Malov, O.V.Subrakova, I.A.Batmanov, S.G.Kljashtornyj, R.F.Tarasenko, and others.
root.details: Н.Базылхан "Көне түрік бітіктастары мен ескерткіштері (Орхон, Ениесей, Талас)" //"Қазақстан тарихы түркі тілді деректемелерде" атты сериясы бойынша. II том. - Алматы: Дайк-пресс, 2005. - Б.182.

pdf.f_title: Памятники тюркской рунической письменности азиатского ареала.
